name: Glass Cannon Massacre
description:
GCM is a fps game created by three different teams during a game jam, with each team working on the game for one day. The theme was coincidence.

The game features singleplayer or multiplayer shooter, where you have to survive for three minutes. Every bullet is randomized, so you'll never know what to expect.

Multiplayer uses peer-to-peer connection that requires port forwarding. (Port 7777 by default)

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Left-mouse - Shoot
  • E - Pause menu
